name: Starwood Property Trust, Inc.
description: Starwood Property Trust, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on originating, acquiring, and managing commercial mortgage loans and other real estate-related debt investments. Founded in 2009 and based in Greenwich, Connecticut, Starwood Property Trust is a part of the Starwood Capital Group, a global private investment firm. The company primarily invests in first mortgage loans, subordinate loans, and preferred equity investments secured by a diverse range of real estate assets, including office buildings, hotels, and multi-family properties. With a disciplined investment strategy, Starwood Property Trust aims to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to its shareholders through a combination of both current income and capital appreciation. The company has built a strong portfolio backed by institutional-grade real estate and benefits from a robust capital structure. Starwood Property Trust is committed to delivering value through active asset management and strategic partnerships, ensuring its ability to navigate market fluctuations effectively. As a publicly traded company, it offers investors an opportunity to participate in the commercial real estate sector while enjoying the benefits of a diversified portfolio managed by a seasoned team of professionals.

faq.question: What does Starwood Property Trust do?

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Starwood Property Trust?
faq.answer: David S. Schwartz is the CEO of Starwood Property Trust, Inc.

faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust is headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut, USA.

faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust offers first mortgage loans, subordinate loans, and preferred equity investments.

faq.question: When was Starwood Property Trust founded?
faq.answer: Starwood Property Trust was founded in 2009.
